100 CLEAR3000:CLS:INPUTM$:PMODE1:SCREEN1,0:PCLS:COLOR2:DRAW"BM0,0"
110 DIMCH(258),C(4),A,R,C,X,Y,G,I,B:G=1:MC=16384
120 FORI=0TO258:READCH(I):NEXT:GOTO830
640 I=ASC(B$)-48:IFI>15THENI=I-6
650 IFI=-16OR(I<0ORI>37)THENI=10
690 I=I*7
700 FORR=0TO6:A=CH(I+R):FORC=0TO4:C(4-C)=A-INT(A/2)*2:A=INT(A/2):NEXT:FORK=0TO4:IFC(K)THENPSET((X+K)*2,(Y+R)*2)
790 NEXT:NEXT:X=X+6:RETURN
830 FORT=1TOLEN(M$):B$=MID$(M$,T,1):GOSUB640:NEXT
899 ON-(INKEY$="")GOTO899:CLS:INPUTM$:PMODE1:SCREEN1,0:PCLS:COLOR2:X=0:Y=0:GOTO830
900 DATA14,17,19,21,25,17,14,4,12,4,4,4,4,14,14,17,1,14,16,16,31,14,17,1,6,1,17,14,2,6,10,18,31,2,2,31,16,30,1,1,17,14
910 DATA6,8,16,30,17,17,14,31,1,2,4,8,16,16,14,17,17,14,17,17,14,14,17,17,15,1,2,12,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,4,10,17,17,31,17,17
920 DATA30,9,9,14,9,9,30,14,17,16,16,16,17,14,30,9,9,9,9,9,30,31,16,16,30,16,16,31,31,16,16,28,16,16,16,15,16,16,19,17,17,15
930 DATA17,17,17,31,17,17,17,14,4,4,4,4,4,14,1,1,1,1,1,17,14,17,18,20,24,20,18,17,16,16,16,16,16,16,31,17,27,21,21,17,17,17
940 DATA17,25,21,19,17,17,17,14,17,17,17,17,17,14,30,17,17,30,16,16,16,14,17,17,17,21,18,13,30,17,17,30,20,18,17
950 DATA14,17,16,14,1,17,14,31,4,4,4,4,4,4,17,17,17,17,17,17,14,17,17,17,10,10,4,4,17,17,17,17,21,27,17,17,17,10,4,10,17,17
960 DATA17,17,10,4,4,4,4,31,1,2,4,8,16,31
